snippet: For Obama administration officials, the searching for a new C.I.A. director comes at a particularly challenging time.
abstract: Obama administration search for new Central Intelligence Agency director to replace David H Petraeus comes at particularly challenging and awkward time; Petraeus, who resigned because of extramarital affair, provided Obama with both experience and political cover.
lead_paragraph: For Obama administration officials, the searching for a new C.I.A. director comes at a particularly challenging time.

headline.seo: Petraeus Replacement Search Is Under Way
headline.main: Amid Upheaval, Obama Loses ‘Source of Stability’
headline.print_headline: Amid Upheaval, Obama Loses ‘Source of Stability’

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
